original_text: besides 220 of the temple servants, whom David and his officials had set apart to attend the Levites. These were all mentioned by name.
korean_text: 다윗과 방백들이 레위 사람들을 섬기라고 준 느디님 사람 중 성전 일꾼은 이백이십 명이었는데 그들은 모두 지명 받은 이들이었더라

sentences.original_text: whom David and his officials had set apart
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗과 그의 관원들이 구별하여 세운 자들

sentences.original_text: These were all mentioned by name
